'''16w14a''' is the first [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9.3]], released on April 7, 2016,<ref name="blog_16w14a">{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160412120126/http://www.mojang.com/2016/04/minecraft-snapshot-16w14a/|title=Minecraft Snapshot 16w14a|website=Mojang.com}}</ref> which fixed an important memory leak related to pathfinding.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=16w14a|prefix=Minecraft
|;From version 1.9.2
|100382|Pathfinding memory leak.
}}</onlyinclude>

{{slicedlime|LRKsIbnKhlU}}

== Trivia ==
* Unlike most of the first-of-the-week snapshots, this was released on a Thursday instead of Wednesday, similar to the snapshots before [[14w26a]].
* 16w14a is the first actual snapshot released on the 14th week of a year, as [[15w14a]] is just an April Fools' joke.
